programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep17
programme.desc: Election - After hes rescued from a cave, a charismatic old lemur challenges Julien to an election for the throne.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep18
programme.desc: Daddy Julien - King Julien believes Mort is the son he never knew he had despite the fact that Mort is two years older than him.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep21
programme.desc: Savior - When all the other students at the Academy find out Cleo is the prophesied "Savior of the Galaxy," she worries they'll treat her differently. Then she worries they won't. Then there's this freaky bug lady.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep22
programme.desc: Pirates - It turns out the Space Pirates are so cool, you guys! Cleo, Akila and Brian get captured by them, but they're so cool it's almost hard to be mad at them, you know?

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep23
programme.desc: Lucky And The Role Reversal - After Aunt Cora moves out, Lucky tries to live a life without rules.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep24
programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep23
programme.desc: Croodtopia / Hand On A Hard Egg - When the adults come down with the sneezles, the kids (including Lerk and Womp) use the chance to create their own society ("you-topia") with no rules, but Eep and Thunk disagree on how to run it/Food is scarce and when a large egg is spotted on the hunting field, Grug, Eep, Snoot, Munk and Squawk call dibbs. It's decided that whoever is tough enough to be the last holding on, wins the food.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep75
programme.desc: Darkest Night - When Stoick is shot down Hiccup and the riders race back to Berk to help

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep77
programme.desc: The Moving Finger Writes - Puss and the gang attempt to find Sino for help to stop the earthquakes and end up on a dangerous journey to The Forbidden Citadel

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep50
programme.desc: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJs birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep75
programme.desc: Darkest Night - When Stoick is shot down Hiccup and the riders race back to Berk to help

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep4
programme.desc: Egg Nag/Game On - The Mighty Ones accidentally knock a bird's Egg out of its nest and must take turns trying to incubate the incredibly annoying Egg until it hatches. / The Mighty Ones move into a board game in the yard that they believe to be a "city," and it's all fun and games until Berry's capitalist greed gets the best of her.

programme.desc: My Fair Bumble - Bumble has been asked to Aunt Tulip's for tea but he is worried that his manners are not up to scratch. He asks the other tots to help him out.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep98
programme.desc: Pineapple Palace Panic - Fifi is supposed to be babysitting Grubby, but she's forgotten! Stingo and Slugsy step in to cover for her, with disastrous results!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep99
programme.desc: Poppy's Big Race - It is the day of the annual Flowertot Race. Poppy is reluctant to enter as she always loses her way. Fifi and Bumble help her train for the big race, but will she win?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep100
programme.desc: Blueberry Hunt - Fifi and Bumble are off to pick all the ripe blueberries off the bush. But when they get there all the berries have disappeared. Who could have taken them?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep45
programme.desc: How Can I Cheer Up Kevin? - JESS, and his friends are looking after Kevin the carp while Horace goes to visit a friend. They decide to clean out HORACE'S pond for him and take all the yukky pond weed to the river where the hungry fishes gobble it up. But when they get back they find that KEVIN is unhappy in his pond. How can I cheer up Kevin? That's the Big Question. First JESS thinks that KEVIN might be lonely so they take it in turns to keep him company. But KEVIN seems even more unhappy than before. Jess thinks that KEVIN is probably hungry. They saw the fish in the river eating weed so they go back to the river to get some for KEVIN. KEVIN gobbles up the weed, but he's soon looking sad again. JESS thinks that maybe staying in one place all the time is making KEVIN unhappy. So he gives him a little holiday in the river. KEVIN really perks up. A holiday seems to be the answer. Except that as soon as he's back in his pond KEVIN is miserable again. Horace comes back and explains to them s how pond weed helps fish to breathe, Jess r

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep46
programme.desc: How Can We Decorate The Christmas Tree? - It's Christmas Eve on Greendale Farm. Jess is very very excited. Every year Mimi decorates the special tree in the woods and the friends all gather around to sing and play and open presents. But when Jess, Mimi and Willow arrive to leave presents at the tree they're shocked to see that the wind has blown all the decorations away! How dreadful! - How will they celebrate Christmas with no decorations? And Mimi can't help as she and Willow have promised to deliver presents outside the farm. Jess promises to work it out How can we decorate the Christmas Tree?' that's the Big Question!. He searches the farm for decorations but cannot find them. Then he realises he's found some lovely natural things that they can use to MAKE decorations. Yippety Yay! Of course! So everyone pulls together and gathers fircones and teasels, straw and bulrushes. As they sing the wond

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep47
programme.desc: How Can I Make The Trolley Go Faster? - Jess and his friends are playing a game trying to use wind power to push the trolley through the hay bale arch. None of them can blow hard enough so it always slows down before it gets to the arch. Jess asks the Big Question - how can I make the trolley go faster. They try different ideas - blowing, making a bigger wind by blowing as a group, making an even bigger wind by flapping potato sacks but nothing is strong enough. Jess is asking Mimi for some help when a big gust of wind catches her potato sack blanket, making it billow out just like a ship's sail, which gives Jess a great idea! Maybe if he ties the sacks to the trolley, like a sail, the trolley will move in the wind. Success! Jess has answered another Big Question - he can move the trolley through the hay bale arch by tying a sail to it! And now they can all have fun riding in the trolley too! Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep48
programme.desc: How Can We Mend Baa's Trough? - There's a hole in the bottom of Baa's trough so none of the thirsty friends can have a drink. How can we mend the trough, wonders Jess. Hey, that's the Big Question. Jess decides to ask Horace for help but Horace has a problem of his own. He's trying to make a lovely new musical sound but the square shaped piece of bark he's got doesn't make a very good noise when he clangs it with a stick. Jess borrows the bark to cover the hole in the trough but it's the wrong shape. He decides to ask Mimi for help with making a different shape to cover the hole. Mimi's making a mosaic, but she can't find anything the right shape to fit the square-shaped hole she has. Jess gives her the bit of bark and it fits perfectly! She sings Jess a shapes song explaining all about different shapes around us. Jess finds a squashed clay pot which is circle shaped. It's the perfect shape to mend the hole and because it's clay the water won't leak out again! They've answered the question. And here comes the rain again so the

programme.title: Olivia Ep5
programme.desc: Olivia Takes A Road Trip - On the looooong drive to Grandma's house, Olivia finds ways to pass the time. She imagines her family traveling in style, as she pilots her very own jumbo jetOlivia Air! By the time they arrive at Grandma's, Olivia's had so much fun that the discomfort of the road trip has been forgotten.

programme.title: Olivia Ep6
programme.desc: Olivia Goes International - When asked to give a presentation for her class's International Day. Olivia can't decide which country to choose. Being Olivia she invents her own country Olivitania -where cupcakes are the national food and the national anthem sounds suspiciously like Puccini.

programme.title: Olivia Ep7
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Alien Brother - After a trip to the planetarium, Ian's knowledge about space and his peculiar behaviour lead Olivia to believe that her brother is an alien. Olivia soon discovers his secrethe's making a special gift for his favourite sister

programme.title: Olivia Ep8
programme.desc: Olivia Plants A Garden - When Mrs. Hogenmuller distributes seeds for a class garden project, Olivia just can't wait for her plants to grow. But when her dog Perry digs up her little garden, Olivia discovers something even more exciting what appears to be a dinosaur bone!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep45
programme.desc: Why Puffadder Sheds His Skin - You see there was a time when Puff Adder didn't shed his skin. All the animals were afraid of Puff Adder because he was very difficult to see and he had a nasty bite. Puff Adder decides that if no beast wants to be his friend then he doesn't want to have any friends. He slithers far, far away to the desert where he bumps into Camel and learns that every animal needs a friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep46
programme.desc: Why Eagle Rules The Skies - You see there was a time when Eagle didn't rule the skies. She was a humble bird who kept herself to self. But then one day things start going wrong for the birds - some beast steals Hen's eggs, Hummingbird loses her hum and Tickbird goes missing! Eagle quietly saves the day and Lion rewards her with half his Kingdom. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep47
programme.desc: Why Skunk Smells - You see there was a time when Skunk didn't smell. Skunk smelt as sweet as sweet can be. Infact, whenever any animal had a smelly problem they went straight to Skunk. And then one day naughty Baboon tricks Skunk into tasting the yucky Smellyfruit! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep48
programme.desc: Why Cricket Crickets / Chirrups - You see there was a time when Cricket didn't chirrup. Infact Cricket didn't do anything at all and it was beginning to get him down. Every animal has a use. Elephant trumpets, Lion roars...but what does Cricket do? And then one day Cricket discovers that he has rhythm. Cricket finds the beat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep11
programme.desc: The Knights Fall Part 2 - Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blades life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side of the Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Sukis prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his friend Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppys surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep4
programme.desc: Empty Is The Head - Exhausted from settling his subjects' disputes, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep16
programme.desc: Bahama Drama - When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep11
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Sam / Toy Driver - Its Tag and Scoochs first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tags old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep13
programme.desc: Photo Day Disaster / The Eightful Eight - When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep4
programme.desc: Where There's Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep7
programme.desc: The Case Of The Little Lost Toy - Smartysaurus is delighted because a little clockwork duck has appeared at the DinoLab. No one knows where she belongs but Noddy is sure that her family must be missing her so he decides to investigate and find her home. Noddy uses all his skills of thinking, looking, listening and asking questions to find the home for the little duck. Things aren't helped by the little duck constantly rushing back to the Dinolab! What is going on? Clever Noddy realises that the little duck is the missing duckling from the new family of ducks at the Calm Farm and soon reunites her with her Mummy and sister. And Smartysaurus is happy too because she can visit her new little friend whenever she wants! Quack, quack Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8
programme.desc: The Case Of Jumpy Revs - Something very strange is happening in Toyland. Lots of things seem to be jumping in a particular direction for no reason Revs, Noddy's bell, Big Ear's spoons and kettle. What is going on? Noddy decides to investigate and help his best friend Revs who is very upset. Using his investigating kit and the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that everything that is jumping is metal! He follows the trail, together with bravely jumpy Revs, to DareDale's Pirate Bay where they find the Pirates on a treasure hunt with a big electronic magnet! Brave Noddy has to jump aboard the wildly careening galleon and turn off the magnet before disaster strikes. Well-done Noddy!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep34
programme.desc: Maximum Override / Gator's Giving - An overzealous librarian is after Archibald for an overdue library book. / Archibald volunteers to be the host of Cousin Ashleys beloved family holiday. But when Ashleys favorite cousin threatens to bail, Archibald works extra hard to make this the best holiday ever.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep5
programme.desc: The First Picture Show - When Thunk invents the first-ever movie using shadow puppets, everyone in Ahhh! Valley loves it...until they are shocked by the ending.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep4
programme.desc: FruLess / Citizen Cape - The Harvey Girls set off to help unfriendly Frufru make friends in time birthday party! Dot gets a little carried away after starting a fashion-forward cape business.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.desc: Photo Day Disaster / The Eightful Eight - When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/BFFF - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesnt believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep52
programme.desc: Switcher-Ruby/Bye Bye Bunker - Poppy and Branch switch bodies, and learn to appreciate each others point of view. /When Branch decides its time for him to move out of the bunker, Poppy tries to be as supportive as she can, even though it seems Branch himself may have some doubts.

programme.desc: Snowtime For Pip - All Pip wants to do is play in the snow. Fifi tries to help him out, and come up with a brilliant idea how they can without it actually snowing!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep102
programme.desc: Pip And The Wizard - Stingo and Slugsy put on a magic show. But will anybody find out that he is a fraud?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep103
programme.desc: Grubby Ahoy - Grubby has got stuck on Aunt Tulip's boat. Can anybody save him before he floats away?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep104
programme.desc: Stingo Has Visitors - Stingo's tree house has been invaded by ants. Fifi is determined to get rid of them, as she doesn't want Stingo and Slugsy staying with her a moment longer than necessary!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep49
programme.desc: What's That Green Hairy Stuff? - Jess and the puppies find some strange green hairy stuff growing under the water barrel. The puppies are scared of it and Jess promises them that he'll find out what it is at once. Hey, that's the big question! Jess thinks the green hairy stuff might be grass. He goes to ask Baa, who's a grass expert. Baa, Billie and Jess compare the green hairy stuff and ordinary grass using Billie's magnifying glass. It isn't grass but it is a plant. Mimi knows all about plants so they go to ask her about the green hairy stuff. She shows them the green hairy tops of carrots but they aren't like Jess's green hairy stuff either. Mimi's sure she's seen this green hairy stuff in other places around the farm. Jess thinks they should look around and see where it grows. There's green hairy stuff growing all over the farm in cool, damp places. Horace knows all about damp cool places. Perhaps he can help! Horace tells them that the green hairy stuff is a plant called moss and it's not scary at all. The puppies agree

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep50
programme.desc: How Can I Find My Friends? - Jess's friends have planned a special surprise but he can't find any of them to find out what it is! How can he find his friends? Hey, that's the Big Question! He finds a trail of Willow's hoof prints but they stop at a puddle. Then they follow a trail of wool from Baa but that stops too. They find a walking haystack but it turns out to be Mimi. Jess is baffled. He can't find anyone else! Mimi helps him realise that he followed clues which led him to her but before Jess can ask her anything else she rushes off. Hmm, thinks Jess, maybe if we follow the clues we found earlier they might lead us to our friends and the special surprise. Jess, Joey and Jinx follow the clues and finds all of their friends waiting for them at a special Follow the Clues surprise picnic! Jess found his friends by following the clues AND he's answered the Big Question! Yippety Yay!

programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Froga's Choice - Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep134
programme.desc: The Great Friendship Show - Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Magenta's Thank You Day Surprise - It's Thank You Day and our friends Miranda and Magenta are coming over to celebrate! When Magenta's picture of what she's thankful for gets ruined, we play a special game of Magenta's Clues to figure out what she's thankful for!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox / Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records. // A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! Now it's up to the pups to save Chickaletta from her fowl new fans.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Kai Express / Ducknado - When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent - Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater / Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep715
programme.desc: Pups Save the Marooned Mayors / Pups Save the Game Show - While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse. // The Wingnuts' farm plays host to a rootin' tootin Game Show hosted by Cowgirl Beryl!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Ultimate Hype Bear / The Chrysalis Crew / Just Say No - Bissy is meeting her favorite band, but Bossy tags along. // Bossy and Turtle find a chrysalis. // Turtle has trouble telling his friends no.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Chickcharney Island / The Lost Girl in a Canoe - With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum. // The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Chicken Abuelo - Toms accidentally turns Abuelo into a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep220
programme.desc: George's Birthday - Today is Georges birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep617
programme.desc: The Snow Spectacular - Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get to the Snow Spectacular in time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep618
programme.desc: The Fastest of them All - When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Pup Pup Goose / Pup Pup and Away - Marshal gets a new BFF when a gosling he names Fuzzy takes a liking to him. // When Mayor Goodway accidentally takes off in a hot air balloon, Ryder and the Paw Patrol must make a dramatic rescue to save her and win the race!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Caf / Paddington Makes a Film - Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddingtons Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist - Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Firefighter Blue to the Rescue! - Josh and Blue suit up to be firefighter helpers for the day! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help the firefighters, we train for duty at the fire house, learn about fire safety, and ride Fiery Truck on a special rescue mission!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Robots to the Rescue - When three big emergencies turn out to be too much for one truck alone, Blaze turns himself and his friends into super strong robots to save Axle City from a runaway train, an overflowing glue factory, and an erupting volcano!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ultra Shell and Wonder Bear / You Ain't Seen Nothing Yeti / Powerless - Bossy helps Turtle's Biggest Dream Come True: being a superhero! // Bossy and Turtle go camping and learn the story of the magical Yeti. // With the power out, Bossy's family must find a way to keep themselves entertained.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus / Pup a Doodle Do - Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! // Mayor Goodways purse chicken Chickaletta has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pigs boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Hide and Seek with Blue - Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hoedown / Pups Save Alex - Its Adventure Bay Western Days, when a herd of cows escape from a train at the railway station! // When their friend Alex decides he wants to be a member of the PAW Patrol the PUPS and Ryder let him come along for the ride.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Meteor Mayhem / Dance Of Destruction - A meteor is heading for earth and Sir Steel's heroic efforts only make the Deer Squad's job in saving the planet even harder! // A dance competition in the Central Forest turns chaotic when Sir Steel uses his monkey suit to beat Rammy in the final.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Guacamole - Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy / Pups Save a Krazy Klimber - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue! // Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Spectacular Skating Spectacular / Gran-Gran Dreams of Japchae / Snow Party - Bossy wants to put on a skating show but he doesn't know how to skate. // Bossy and Turtle plan a special night for Gran-Gran but cant agree on planning. // Bossy tries to create a snow day party without snow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup - Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present! // When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Shrunken Ships - When Escarlata turns the crew tiny, they have to find a pint-sized way to save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep519
programme.desc: George's New Dinosaur - When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Tiny Creatures - Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep707
programme.desc: The Flying Contest - AJ is entering in the Axle City Flying Contest. But when Crusher sends him and Blaze away, they must get back in time for AJ to build his super-cool flying invention!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep706
programme.desc: The Snowflake Games - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep925
programme.desc: Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks / Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys - When a mysterious storm drops hailstones that hatch into Baby Space Rocks, the Pups must find a way to keep them safe. // A 3-D printer leads to trouble when Eddie and Emmy make 3-D reproductions of themselves and play pranks all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep926
programme.desc: Charger Visits the Pups / Pups Save a Shiny Ride - Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe. // Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a "Shinest Ride Contest", so it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and The Bad Swap - Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington The Table Tennis Champ! - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep707
programme.desc: The Flying Contest - AJ is entering in the Axle City Flying Contest. But when Crusher sends him and Blaze away, they must get back in time for AJ to build his super-cool flying invention!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia - When the coqus of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.// The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep110
programme.desc: New Squid on the Block / Boss Bissy / To BFF or Not to BFF - When a new kid starts at school, Bossy does everything to make sure they have a good time. // Bossy wishes he was older like his big sister. // Bossy and Turtle fail to get a perfect score on a bestie quiz.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bunnies / Puptacular - Farmer Yumi's carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help. // Katie is excited to be entering one of the Paw Patrol pups into a puppy grooming competition "Puptacular" in the next town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups Save a Class Pet - Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Bedtime Story - Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Lost Keys - After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep142
programme.desc: The Vegetable Pie - Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep143
programme.desc: The Surprise - They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.desc: The Decorating Badge - The dog is painting the clubhouse and the squirrels ask if they can help, but they have some different colours in mind.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep33
programme.desc: The Tidy Up Badge - A big package arrives for Duggee while he is dusting - an amazing new vacuum cleaner.

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Mudslide - It's a very rainy day at the Go Jet Academy and the Go Jetters are teaching the Cadets some crucial Go Jetter skills.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch - When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Long and Short - Kit and Pup are cycling. Can you see who is riding the long bike and who is riding the short bike? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators measure their footprints.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: Star - Dee encourages a friend to say 'star', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of stars - a yellow star, a bright one, a pointy star and a jingle star.

programme.desc: Bouncing - Laa-Laa and Po drive in the Tubby Car to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on the Tubby Bouncy. Tinky Winky and Dipsy arrive and they have a go at bouncing too!

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Peekaboo - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing as they play Peekaboo.

programme.title: Clangers S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Hello - Small catches a space probe while fishing. Major says it is a useless thing but Mother thinks the probe might be visiting to say 'hello'. This gives Major Clanger an idea!

programme.desc: The Thing That Was Open and Closey - The Dinopaws try to make friends with a particularly shy gang of Clam creatures.

programme.desc: Music Show - On a very hot day, everyone has their windows open and they're all playing music...

programme.desc: The Circus Badge - The Squirrels are excited that a circus has come to town, until they see it is a flea circus. However, they realise it is impressive when they see the acts.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. programme.title: Pelopor Dokumentari (Rpt)
programme.desc: Penerbit-penerbit dokumentari tanah air telah berkumpul di Langkawi, Kedah untuk menghadiri sesi belajar sambil berkongsi idea sesama mereka. Festival 'Walk The Doc' kali kedua di Malaysia ini telah dianjurkan dengan hasrat untuk menggalakkan generasi penerbit muda yang hadir lebih kreatif dalam berkarya. Sesi mengolah idea kepada imej ini melihat kehadiran yang amat menggalakkan. Ramai yang mengulang hadir untuk menerima bimbingan pakar industri dari stesen-stesen televisyen yang disegani termasuk NHK, Jepun dan KBS, Korea Selatan, antaranya. Semoga idea yang dikaryakan terus kreatif dan inovatif, berinspirasikan pengalaman dan semangat masing-masing.

programme.desc: Penerbit-penerbit dokumentari tanah air telah berkumpul di Langkawi, Kedah untuk menghadiri sesi belajar sambil berkongsi idea sesama mereka. Festival 'Walk The Doc' kali kedua di Malaysia ini telah dianjurkan dengan hasrat untuk menggalakkan generasi penerbit muda yang hadir lebih kreatif dalam berkarya. Sesi mengolah idea kepada imej ini melihat kehadiran yang amat menggalakkan. Ramai yang mengulang hadir untuk menerima bimbingan pakar industri dari stesen-stesen televisyen yang disegani termasuk NHK, Jepun dan KBS, Korea Selatan, antaranya. Semoga idea yang dikaryakan terus kreatif dan inovatif, berinspirasikan pengalaman dan semangat masing-masing.

programme.title: Landline Ep32
programme.desc: Encouraging workers to consider careers in agriculture, growing mushrooms in the old Holden factory, community opposition to the government plan to "re-wire the nation", plus the carpenter giving old shearing tables new life.

programme.title: Folau Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - How a social media post landed one of our most gifted and controversial athletes at the centre of the culture wars. Part 2 explores the fallout and its impact on the LGBTQI, Rugby, and Pasifika communities.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep75
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: First Weapons - Returning Boomerang Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In South Australia, host Phil Breslin, weapon maker Moogy Sumner and our team of experts unpack the science of Australia's most iconic and scientifically complex weapon - the Returning Boomerang.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole - Jewel Of Denial Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Marc Fennell unravels the true history of the Koh I Noor diamond which sits at the heart of the Crown Jewels. But beyond the glitz, he reveals the tragedy of a 10-year-old Sikh boy ripped from his mother and kingdom.

programme.title: Australia's Vietnam War Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Our veterans set out daily life under constant vigilance and explain how the battles of Long Tan and Coral-Balmoral unfolded. Politically, Australia's relationship with the US had never been stronger.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Treasures - Wild Alps Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Australia might be world famous for its outback and red deserts, but there are also lush alpine regions that are just as unique and breathtaking and play a central role to the animals living along the east coast.

programme.title: Compass - Searching For Patsy Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Journalist Jason Om and his Muslim half-sister set out to understand the late mother they never really knew. They uncover harsh truths and break silences about their beloved mother, the complex and charming Patsy.

programme.title: Art Works - Reuben Kaye, Daniel Riley Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Namila checks out what's on at Heide; Reuben Kaye talks cabaret, community and catharsis; we talk to Daniel Riley, Australian Dance Theatre's first Indigenous Artistic Director; and meet Malian musician Viex Farka Toure.

programme.title: Australian Story - Atonement - Dean Yates Ep21
programme.desc: War correspondent Dean Yates thought he was indestructible but when two of his staff were gunned down by the US military in Iraq, he & his family reached breaking point. Now he's trying heal the wounds of war and help others.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep187
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Drum Ep172
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep187
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: The Business Ep134
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep34

programme.title: The World Ep187

programme.desc: We meet Pakistani Habib ur Rahman who creates power wheelchairs in Kobayashi City, Miyazaki, as well as Chinese Xia Siya who works in children's education support in Yubari City, Hokkaido.

programme.title: Nun'S Cookbook
programme.desc: The temple chefs deep fry summer vegetables, then dip them into a flavorful dashi broth. This colorful dish is a feast for both mouth and eyes!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Russia's invasion of Ukraine has caused widespread damage, including destroyed houses, schools, and hospitals. Structural engineer Miyamoto Hideki is working with local people to repair buildings.

programme.title: Learn Japanese From The News
programme.desc: In August, a shrine in Okayama Prefecture held an event showcasing the quenching process of a roughly 80cm Japanese sword. The sword will be dedicated to the shrine's deity in December.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Ren, from Vietnam, started a guesthouse in Nagano Prefecture. Her belief is: a welcoming environment leads to a more livable community. We take a look at interactions between Ren and the townspeople.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce "Samurai Castles" from "Time & Tide", which shows Japanese castles as attainments of Samurai wisdom. We present two episodes of Hikone Castle and Matsumoto Castle.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Reading Japan
programme.desc: Reading Japan shares short stories and narrative essays from Japan. Today's episode is "The Rumor About Mr. Aoyama" by Kodama, a heartwarming essay about the author's junior high school art teacher.

programme.title: National Parks Of Japan:Akan-Mashu
programme.desc: Akan-Mashu National Park is home to Lake Akan, Lake Kussharo, and Lake Mashu. It provides unique winter sights and the opportunity to experience the indigenous Ainu culture.

programme.title: Seasoning The Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Reading Japan
programme.desc: Reading Japan shares short stories and narrative essays from Japan. Today's episode is "Knock" by Arai Motoko, a science fiction short story about a mysterious camphor tree and an old woman.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week: Mayumura Chiaki (an idol who sings with her guitar and self-made backing tracks) and Tielle (a singer getting attention for anime and drama themes).

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
programme.desc: Higashinada Danjiri involves a parade of decorated floats, pulled by teams of veterans and ridden by young performers that lean out over the crowd. 32 districts take part with their own float.

programme.title: Life After School: Stay Or Go?
programme.desc: We met with a group of international students to hear about their experiences and plans in Japan. Do they see a future for themselves here? Or are they planning to go back abroad? Let's find it!

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from September 17, Day 8 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
programme.desc: Prelims - Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.
